r.d: Selection of methods that are often needed when working with XML documents. Functionality includes creating of attribute lists from arrays, creation of tags, validation of XML names and more.
r.n: Changed license to New BSD License (Req #13826 [ashnazg]) Added a test suite against all API methods [ashnazg] Switch to package.xml v2 [ashnazg] Added Req #13839: Missing XHTML empty tags to collapse [ashnazg|drry] Fixed Bug #5392: encoding of ISO-8859-1 is the only supported encoding [ashnazg] Fixed Bug #4950: Incorrect CDATA serializing [ashnazg|drry] -- (this fix differs from the one in v1.2.0a1)
